verses.verse: לְכוּ֙ <WH1980> Come וְנָשׁ֣וּבָה <WH7725> and let us return אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ה֥וּא <WH1931> He טָרָ֖ף <WH2963> for he hath torn וְיִרְפָּאֵ֑נוּ <WH7495> and he will heal יַ֖ךְ <WH5221> us he hath smitten וְיַחְבְּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <WH2280> and he will bind us up

יְחַיֵּ֖נוּ <WH2421> will he revive מִיֹּמָ֑יִם <WH3117> After two days בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> us in the third יְקִמֵ֖נוּ <WH6965> he will raise us up וְנִחְיֶ֥ה <WH2421> and we shall live לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> in his sight

וְנֵדְעָ֣ה <WH3045> Then shall we know נִרְדְּפָ֗ה <WH7291> [if] we follow לָדַ֙עַת֙ <WH3045> on to know אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כְּשַׁ֖חַר <WH7837> as the morning נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> is prepared מֽוֹצָא֑וֹ <WH4161> his going forth וְיָב֤וֹא <WH935> and he shall come כַגֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1653> unto us as the rain לָ֔נוּ כְּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <WH4456> as the latter י֥וֹרֶה <WH3138> autumn rain אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> unto the earth

מָ֤ה <WH4100> What אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> what shall I do לְּךָ֙ אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> O Ephraim מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> what shall I do לְּךָ֖ יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> unto thee? O Judah וְחַסְדְּכֶם֙ <WH2617> unto thee? for your goodness כַּֽעֲנַן־ <WH6051> cloud בֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> [is] as a morning וְכַטַּ֖ל <WH2919> dew מַשְׁכִּ֥ים <WH7925> and as the early הֹלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> it goeth away

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that חָצַ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH2672> Therefore have I hewed בַּנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> [them] by the prophets הֲרַגְתִּ֖ים <WH2026> I have slain בְּאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> them by the words פִ֑י <WH6310> of my mouth וּמִשְׁפָּטֶ֖יךָ <WH4941> and thy judgments א֥וֹר <WH216> [are as] the light יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> [that] goeth forth

כִּ֛י <WH3588> in חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> mercy חָפַ֖צְתִּי <WH2654> For I desired וְלֹא־ <WH3808> rather זָ֑בַח <WH2077> and not sacrifice וְדַ֥עַת <WH1847> and the knowledge אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God מֵעֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH5930> more than burnt offerings
וְהֵ֕מָּה <WH1992> like כְּאָדָ֖ם <WH121> Adam עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> have transgressed בְרִ֑ית <WH1285> the covenant שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> There בָּ֥גְדוּ <WH898> there have they dealt treacherously בִֽי׃
גִּלְעָ֕ד <WH1568> Gilead קִרְיַ֖ת <WH7151> [is] a city פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> of them that work אָ֑וֶן <WH205> iniquity עֲקֻבָּ֖ה <WH6121> [and is] polluted מִדָּֽם׃ <WH1818> with blood

וּכְחַכֵּ֨י <WH2442> of robbers wait אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> for a man גְּדוּדִ֗ים <WH1416> And as troops חֶ֚בֶר <WH2267> [so] the company כֹּֽהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of priests דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way יְרַצְּחוּ־ <WH7523> murder שֶׁ֑כְמָה <WH7927> to Shechem כִּ֥י <WH3588> Surely זִמָּ֖ה <WH2154> lewdness עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> for they commit

בְּבֵית֙ <WH1004> in the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I have seen [שַׁעֲרִירִיָּה כ] (שַׁעֲרֽוּרִיָּ֑ה <WH8186> horrible thing ק) שָׁ֚ם <WH8033> is there זְנ֣וּת <WH2184> there [is] the whoredom לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim נִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> is defiled יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

גַּם־ <WH1571> Also יְהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> Also O Judah שָׁ֥ת <WH7896> he hath set קָצִ֖יר <WH7105> an harvest לָ֑ךְ בְּשׁוּבִ֖י <WH7725> for thee when I returned שְׁב֥וּת <WH7622> the captivity עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people פ
